nodes.text: The Web was a district located on the planet Troithe, so named by the locals. The area had many factories, most of which were decommissioned by the Galactic Civil War. Most of the residents resided in large tubes designed to be skyways, but which resembled sewers to the New Republic pilot Nath Tensent.
The Web appeared in the 2020 novel Shadow Fall, written by Alexander Freed.
